summary: Director Michael Almereyda's documentary on the weeks just prior to Sam Shepard's stage production of his play "The Late Henry Moss."
cast: Sean Penn|Nick Nolte|Cheech Marin|Sheila Tousey|T Bone Burnett|Sam Shepard|James Gammon|Woody Harrelson|Ann Militello|Shona Mitchell
keywords: long title|hyphen in title|punctuation in title|character name in title
title: This So-Called Disaster: Sam Shepard Directs the Late Henry Moss
